text: "Two Black Cadillacs" is a 2012 song by country artist Carrie Underwood and is the third single from her fourth studio album Blown Away. It went to number 41 in the United States and number 52 in Canada. It also went to number 4 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs charts and number 3 on the Canadian Country charts. ==References== Category:2012 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Country pop songs Category:Carrie Underwood songs
title: Two Black Cadillacs
